column4: When I upgraded my vbox I had to upgrade guest additions to make it work properly. Before that, there was some bizarre behaviour going on.
Give a starving man a fish and he eats for one meal. Give him a fishing net and he eats forever
my guess he`s used vista to make free space to install linux, but for some reason ubuntu doesnt like the fact its used vista.
had my mate with the same problem other day.  He just redid the whole disk, it was all virgin installs anyway
